thread.title: Fran J

author: Fran J
title: Fran J
text: My husband and I looked forward to travel in our "golden years." But we overlooked the need for live-in cat care while away. In five years we traveled twice because finding someone was difficult and often the fee was beyond our budget. A friend told us about TrustedHousesitters and poof! Problem solved. It has made a huge difference in our lives. We can be away from home and feel confident our cats and our home are being cared for during our absence. Now the hard part is setting our departure and return dates!
